General.Name: Eastparc Hotel Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Eastparc Hotel Tbk owns and operates hotels in Indonesia. The company operates Eastparc Hotel, a 5-star hotel that comprises a variety of rooms, restaurant and café, beauty and retail stores, meetings and events organizing centers, and various facilities located in the Yogyakarta. PT Eastparc Hotel Tbk was founded in 2011 and is based in Yogyakarta, Indonesia.
General.Address: Jl. Laksda Adisucipto Km 6.5 Seturan, Yogyakarta, Indonesia, 55281
